content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the web_search command to gather information on the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The command returned links to websites such as U.S. News Travel, Time Out Switzerland, and Lonely Planet. These websites provided practical tips, activity suggestions, and accommodation recommendations for travelers. Lonely Planet also had a section on the best destinations and experiences for 2023. 

I executed the shell command to open links to websites on Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. However, I encountered an error due to the lack of a DISPLAY environment variable.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best attractions activities accommodations Boston Porto Switzerland"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "https://www.fourseasons.com/", "https://www.aman.com/", "https://www.fairmont.com/copley-plaza-boston/", "https://www.warwickhotels.com/warwick-destinations", "https://www.ihg.com/hotels/us/en/reservation", "https://www.marriott.com/hotel-search.mi", "https://www.timeout.com/porto"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "question": "What are the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a travel website featuring articles and guides on various destinations and travel interests. It includes information on Boston, Porto, and Switzerland, but does not provide a specific list of the best attractions, activities, and accommodations for these locations.\n\nLinks: ['Check out our trending guides (https://shop.lonelyplanet.com/collections/trending-destinations)', ' (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/)', 'Sign In (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/api/auth/login)', ' Saved lists (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile)', ' eLibrary (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile/library)']", type='action_result')]
"""
